title: Strengthening Customer Experience Competencies: Simulation-Based Unconscious Bias Awareness and Response Training

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners identify at least three impacts of unconscious bias on team collaboration through simulation scenarios.
Learners execute at least two specific response strategies in bias-inducing situations.
Learners participate in simulations at least four times per month in mobile learning environments and submit feedback notes.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
